title: Reservations in the DP shall be developed to the fullest extent
clause_text: Reservations in the DP shall be developed to the fullest extent. Additional amenities and facilities shall be provided as per the quantum shown in Annexure – ‘A’ to this Regulation. Relocation of reservations within sector if so required to overcome the sector planning constraint shall be permitted with the special permission of CEO/OSD(DRP) of SRA.
